de.mixedfx.file

Class DataHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mixedfx.file.DataHandler

  • public class DataHandler
extends java.lang.Object
     FileFolderHandler offers generic methods to access/change/delete
 files and folders. It shall be used as first choice, all other file / folder accessing methods you can find in Apache's commons io.
 It contains four sections of methods:
    1. Listing methods
    2. File/Folder methods
    3. Other methods

      • createOrFindFile

        public static java.io.File createOrFindFile(FileObject fileObject)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates or finds a file. Creation could take some time.
        Parameters:
        fileObject - The fileObject which should be created.
        Returns:
        Returns the new created file or the found file which already exists
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • readFile

        public static java.io.File readFile(FileObject fileObject)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Finds a file by retrieving it only with its name. The extension is NOT needed but can be available.
        Parameters:
        fileObject - The fileName with or without extension! If without extension it finds first a file with equal file name which has no extension, otherwise the first file with equal file name with extension, otherwise the file is not found.
        Returns:
        Returns the found file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Throws exception if file doesn't exist

      • writeFile

        public static java.io.File writeFile(FileObject data)
        Writes a file using createOrFindFile(FileObject) ignoring exceptions.
        Parameters:
        data - Should contain also the extension!
        Returns:
        Returns the file or null if it could not create a file.

      • deleteFile

        public static boolean deleteFile(FileObject fullPath)
        Deletes a file
        Parameters:
        fullPath - The full absolute directory + file name
        Returns:
        True if file was successfully deleted or false if deletion failed

      • createFolder

        public static FileObject createFolder(FileObject folder)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a folder from a FileObject.
        Parameters:
        folder - A representation of the folder which shall be created.
        Returns:
        Returns the folder (same as parameter).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If folder couln't be created it throws a IOException.

      • fuse

        public static java.lang.String fuse(java.lang.String directory,
                                    java.lang.String fileFolder)
        Fuses directory and file to one full path.
        Parameters:
        directory - Should contain only \\ or / as folder separator. Last char as \\ or / is not needed.
        fileFolder - The file or folder which should be fused.
        Returns:
        Returns a full string containing the directory and file or folder
